name: Release v0.6.5
body:
## What's Changed
* Update examples by @TsumiNa in https://github.com/yoshida-lab/XenonPy/pull/259


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yoshida-lab/XenonPy/compare/v0.6.4...v0.6.5

name: Release v0.6.4
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix __repr__ error on `BaseCompositionFeaturizer` by @TsumiNa in https://github.com/yoshida-lab/XenonPy/pull/258


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yoshida-lab/XenonPy/compare/v0.6.3...v0.6.4

name: Release v0.6.3
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix 'GaussianLogLikelihood' object has no attribute 'descriptor' error by @TsumiNa in https://github.com/yoshida-lab/XenonPy/pull/254


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yoshida-lab/XenonPy/compare/v0.6.2...v0.6.3

name: Release v0.6.2
body:
* Include add_Hs option in DescriptorFeature

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yoshida-lab/XenonPy/compare/v0.6.1...v0.6.2

name: Release v0.5.2
body: Release v0.5.2

name: Release v0.5.1
body: See details at https://xenonpy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changes.html#v0-5-1

name: Release v0.5.0
body: See details at https://xenonpy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changes.html#v0-5-0

name: Release v0.4.3
body: This release contains some bug fixes.

name: Release v0.4.2
body:
**Bug fix**

* fix ``set_param`` method dose not set the children in ``BaseDescriptor`` and ``NGram``. ( #163, #159 )

**Enhance**

* Setting ``optimizer``, ``loss_func``, and etc. can be done in ``Trainer.load``. ( #158 )
* Improve docs.  ( #155 )

name: Release v0.4.1
body:
**Bug fix**

* Fix `trainer.model = model` do not reset extensions error.

name: Release v0.3.7
body: This release fixes the critical bug in Splitter when using a CV split.

name: Release v0.3.6
body:
**Breaking change**

* Renamed ``BayesianRidgeEstimator`` to ``GaussianLogLikelihood``.
* Removed the ``estimators`` property from ``BayesianRidgeEstimator``.
* Added ``predict`` method into ``GaussianLogLikelihood``.

name: Release v0.3.5
body:
**Enhance**
* Add version specifiers

name: Release v0.3.4
body:
**Bug fix**
*  Calculation error in iqspr estimator (#124 )

name: Release 0.3.3
body:
**Bug fix**
* fix 'mp_ids.txt' not exist error when trying to build the sample data using `preset.build`

name: Release v0.3.2
body:
**Enhanced**

* Updated sample codes.
* Added progress bar for ngram training. ( #93 )
* Added error handling to NGram when generating new SMILES. ( #97 )

**CI**

* Removed python 3.5 support. ( #95 )
* Added Appveyor CI for windows tests. ( #90 )

name: Release v0.3.1
body:
**Enhanced**

* Add tutorials for main modules. ( #79 )

name: release v0.3.0
body:
**Breaking changes**:

* Remove Built-in data ``mp_inorganic``, ``mp_structure``, ``oqmd_inorganic`` and ``oqmd_structure``. ( #12  #20 )
* Change name of ``LocalStorage`` to ``Storage``.

**Enhanced**

* Add error handling for ``NGram`` training. ( #75  #86 )
* Add error handling for ``IQSPR``. ( #69 )
* Add error handling for ``BaseDescriptor`` and ``BaseFeaturizer``. ( #73 )
* Add featurizer selection function. ( #47 )

**New Features**

* Add sample data building function for ``preset``. ( #81 #84 )

name: release v0.2.3
body:
This release fix some bugs in MDL and BaseDescriptor class.
There are no breaking changes.

name: release v0.2.2
body: This release fixed a bug

name: Release v0.1.10
body:
**Enhance**
- Add error handling for “BaseFeaturizer”
Fix long description in setup.py
